title: "Parker + Farr" Bauhaus geometric sans logo
content:
Does anyone know what the ’Parker + Farr’ typeface could be?

[http://www.parker-and-farr-furniture.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905124138/http:/www.parker-and-farr-furniture.co.uk/)

Many thanks.

 [‹ (x) Avant Garde Gothic, Amost embarassed to ask...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905124138/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44859 "Go to previous forum topic") [[ASK] Iron Man The Movie Fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905124138/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43241 "Go to next forum topic")
author: HGPrepro

comments.content: Due to its forced geometry and lack of optical correction it looks like it’s custom drawn. I could be wrong though.

Hi Glen,

check Mike’s [Bauhaus Faces ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905124138/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces.html) for alternatives.  
F
